comment.author: 92747288@N03
comment._content:
Government House, Hobart, Tasmania.


Huon Road is a road that travels South-West out of Hobart to a little mountain town called Fern Tree. Huon Road and Fern Tree are typically 5 degrees lower than Hobart at any given time.

comment.author: 99479038@N00
comment._content:
Location 1 should be - Hobart, Tasmania, Australia

Location 2 should be - South of Hobart, Tasmania, Australia

Bit difficult to tell exactly where the photo was taken, but could be from south of Ferntree looking north to Mt Wellington, and in winter.

The Huon Road was the original link from Hobart to the Huon Valley, constructed in the late 1800s.  Previously the only link was by a rough track or by sea.
